name: Town of Warfare
description:
WELCOME TO THE TOWN OF WARFARE!

Here in a small town, you are faced with many opsticles, and your main objective is to kill all the enemys, before to many of them spawn.

CURRENT STATUS OF THE GAME:

This game is currently in early access, and is bound to enormous changes. Nothing you see in this game is the final product. More updates will be released over time.
